trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There was one other sighting in Atlanta on or around November 11th 2010
Summary: fire work type 10ft above a streetlight
divs: sighting detailsi went out side on my patio which is facing [locations removed\cms\tg] to smoke a cigerette cus my lights where turnt off dat night , goin on the object look like somebody shooted a fire work in the air those fire rockets there was no one outside there was no noise are nothing it was bout ten feet above from the light post i was stund about what i had saw i dont belive #$%& like this but how could it happen here in da hood a lot of #$%& walkn around here i was spooked i would like someone to speak with me about this to see if im crazy or not help thanks
